name: git-hex-backup-refs
title: git-hex backup ref (loose ref)
description: Read a loose git-hex backup ref file under .git/refs/git-hex/backup/. Note: refs may be packed (no loose ref files). Expand repoPath to the absolute repo path (RFC 6570, e.g., /Users/me/repo) and backupId to a single filename like 1700000000_rebaseWithPlan_1234512345.
